org.jenetics.util

Class Random64

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • org.jenetics.util.Random64
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LCG64ShiftRandom

    public abstract class Random64
extends Random
    An abstract base class which eases the implementation of Random objects which natively creates random long values. All other Random functions are optimized using this long values.
    public class MyRandom64 extends Random64 { @Override public long nextLong() { // Only this method must be implemented. ... } }
    Since:
    1.1
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Franz Wilhelmst√∂tter
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • nextLong

        public abstract long nextLong()
        Force to explicitly override the Random.nextLong() method. All other methods of this class are implemented by calling this method.
        Overrides:
        nextLong in class Random

      • of

        public static Random64 of(LongSupplier supplier)
        Create a new Random64 instance, where the random numbers are generated by the given long supplier.
        Parameters:
        supplier - the random number supplier
        Returns:
        a new Random64 instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the given supplier is null.

      • nextInt

        public int nextInt(int min,
                   int max)
        Returns a pseudorandom, uniformly distributed int value between min and max (end points included).
        Parameters:
        min - lower bound for generated integer (inclusively)
        max - upper bound for generated integer (inclusively)
        Returns:
        a random integer greater than or equal to min and less than or equal to max
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if min >= max
        See Also:
        random.nextInt(java.util.Random, int, int)

      • nextLong

        public long nextLong(long min,
                     long max)
        Returns a pseudorandom, uniformly distributed int value between min and max (end points included).
        Parameters:
        min - lower bound for generated long integer (inclusively)
        max - upper bound for generated long integer (inclusively)
        Returns:
        a random long integer greater than or equal to min and less than or equal to max
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if min >= max
        See Also:
        random.nextLong(java.util.Random, long, long)

      • nextLong

        public long nextLong(long n)
        Returns a pseudorandom, uniformly distributed int value between 0 (inclusive) and the specified value (exclusive), drawn from the given random number generator's sequence.
        Parameters:
        n - the bound on the random number to be returned. Must be positive.
        Returns:
        the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed int value between 0 (inclusive) and n (exclusive) from the given random number generator's sequence
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if n is smaller than 1.
        See Also:
        random.nextLong(java.util.Random, long)

        Parameters:

        max - upper bound for generated float value (exclusively)
        Returns:
